values:
hey

well today was alyshas party & it was sooooo much fun...we did the murder mystery that we were supposed to do last year (lol gary m & sally) & so yea we did that & it was really fun! & what we did is cuz alysha moved last year so she flew in & we had her birthday party while she was here & we all chipped in ($16) so we could buy her a videocamera & so we taped the whole mystery (without her knowing that it was her camera) (she thought that it was beccas new camera) so yea we did the mystery & we did the cake & then becca was like ok lets do presents now & we were like o uhhh...i didnt bring one & alysha being the sweetheart that she is said thats ok it would just b more for me to bring on the plane & then briana was like o wait...i have a present & she gave her a blank tape & alysha was like wow thx & then becca was like...o yea...this is urs too (talking about the videocamea) & alyshas jaw dropped soooo far!!!!!! it was hilarious!!!!!!!!!!! lol good times

love always 
chel
http://legallysuthern4.livejournal.com/7795.html

hey

well i was sick like all week but this weekend we have monday off (even tho we were supposed to have friday off but our stupid school district is making us make-up the rita days because all they care about is their precious test scores!!!!!!! ya kno what i say?!?!?!?!?!? SCREW IT!!!!!!!!! WHAT CAN U DO IN 4 DAYS?!?!?!?!?!?!? ABSOLUTELY NOTHING!!!!!!!!! IM PISSED ABOUT THAT!!!!!!!!!! grrrrrrrrr) but anyway yea & i was thinking....how many ppl r actually reading this? i dont think anyone is i mean unless ur really bored ur not gunna sit there & read like a page of crap about someone elses drama...dont we all have enough of that in our own lives? i mean if someone tells u a story over the phone or online or something like that but i mean sitting there reading a full page?!?!?!? i think not!!!! no one has enough time for that i dont think! at least i dont! like me & luke were talking & it was like this:

me: sooooo i havent talked to u in forever...do u have a gf
luke: no
me: & why not?
luke: i dont have the time...school football dinner homework bed & then it starts over again
me: i kno thats my problem too not enough time
luke: there just rnt enough hours in the day!
me: i kno its sad!!! i mean were only 13!!!!!!
luke: i kno it is sad!

love always
chel
http://legallysuthern4.livejournal.com/7514.html

hey

ok soooo good week! we didnt have school on last thursday friday monday & tuesday! then on wednesday my ballet teacher ms vicky said that she wants to move me up a level which i have been waiting for sice august when i started ballet here! then i found out that i made showstoppers & mixed choir & mixed choir is like the best girls & the best guys in the school! yay! & showstoppers today was so fun (sorry becca lol) so yea o yea & im staying with becca for the weekend because my parents r going to my cousins wedding in chicago...yea good week!

love always
chel
http://legallysuthern4.livejournal.com/7267.html

hey

ok so either at like 3 am or like tomarrow at a reasonable time we r going to dallas to stay with my moms friends & so i hope my house stays ok & yea but thats were im going & if ur a michigan ppl then just kno that im taking my scrapbook & im gunna try to call everyone but idk when so yea but i will b checking my email like everyday so email me if u need me & im gunna try to get on alot too but idk if my moms friends will want me to b on their comp but hopefully they wont care  stupid rita lol o well i love hurricanes most of the time...o yea did i mention that we dont have school at least thurs & fri & maybe not on mon either so yea ok my email is legallysuthern4u@yahoo.com so email me & ill try to call everyone

love always
chel

hey

ok so i was kind of worried because show stoppers was supposed to b on wednesday but ms glass moved it to tuesday so im excited!!!!!!! & tomarrow or the next dau during class im gunna try out for the mixed choir which will b the best choir in the school & theres only gunna b like 20 girls & 10 guys & thats on monday & ms glass said that i would b able to leave early for dance ever week which is good! yay! i love singing & i will take every chance i get to improve my voice (not that its not fabulous already lol)!!!!!!!!!!!!!

love always

hey

omg im soooooooo excited! today i found out that i make showstoppers (which is basically the same thing as show choir rochester ppl)!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! 

me & becca & her mom & my mom went to see just like heaven today! it was soooooo good...u have to see it & then we went to olive garden for dinner!!!!!! yummmmmmmmmmmmmmm!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

o yea & my cousin is coming in from fort worth to visit this weekend & i have nutcracker auditions tomarrow for dance!!! ahhhh crazy

me & becca & casey are also doing history fair & if we do this then we dont have to do amy of the other projects at all for the rest of the year!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

love always

hey

omg! today in gym we had to run 3 laps around the track outside in like 100 degree weather...i was literally about to pass out & of course i had to get gym last period so after running i change back into my JEANS!! & get on the dying hot bus    grrrrrrrrrrrr i hate this & im kinda pissed at gary

http://legallysuthern4.livejournal.com/6240.html

hey

it was sooo funny today in choir....ok so first kno this... we have a warm up that goes...who washed washington's white wooly underwear when washington's washing woman went west (and we singit really really fast & its so much fun) anyway...so mr womack (on of the choir teachers) was saying that he wanted the tenor/bass choir (the guys with the period before us) to sing that but lightly & softly but he ended up saying something like..."ok guys now sing who washed washington's but, lightly & softly" & they all started laughing & they were like u said who washed washington's but!!!! hahahahahaha ok u had to b there to hear him explain it but it was still funny

ok the other thing...ok ya kno how sunday was september 11? ok well i watched this thing that talked about flight 93 which was the one that was gunna hit the capital building but it didnt & the story was that these 4 guys hijacked the plane (obviously) & so all of the ppl were pushed back into coach & so the ppl were calling their families & thier families were telling them that there were planes that flew into the twin towers & the pentagon & so the ppl realized that they couldnt sit back & let them drive the plane into the capital & kill all of the ppl that were in there....they were gunna stop them so they brought the flight attendants cart (which weighs somewhere around 200-300 pounds) & they smashed into one of the guys & they threw boiling water at another guy & stuff & so the guy who was driving the plane desided to just run it into the ground but they said that the ppl were trying to break into the cockpit & the recording of the sound hasnt been released yet but some of the family members that heard it said that right when the tape stoped ...it sounded like the ppl broke into the cockpit & yea it was cool but another sad thing was that a lot of the ppl switched flights just to b on that one & the truth is that all of those ppl saved everyone who was left in the capital...cool huh! i thought it was
anyway

love always
chel
http://legallysuthern4.livejournal.com/5982.html

hey

omg im sooooooooooooo tired right now.  i just woke up like 30 minutes ago which would have made it 2:30.  how can i sleep that late? well last night my church had a jr high lock-in.  it was sooo much fun i hung out with becca & amy the whole time & we like...watched movies & ran around & played cards & nintendo & GUESTURES (haha lol)  yea so i stayed up till 6:30 (am) & then got woken up at like 7:15 so we could go home.  so we fropped becca off & went home & i just completely crashed...like i was dead asleep it was terrible so yea but im still tired so i might go back to bed soon.  ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh im soooooooooooooooooooo tired so if im away...i might be away for a while lol

love always
chel

D:   yea sooooo yea & then crystal rode my bus today which was crazy because thats crystal...crazy & yea so she was going home with BreAnn & BreAnn lives down the street from me so now crystal knos where i live...great  im scared  help  ok byebye

hey

well...idk...me & becca r going to the lock-in at my church friday night & thats gunna b soooo much fun!!!!!!!!! & yesterday we mage some of those tie blankets ya kno so we could bring the with us...on the bottom we have the same white stiped fabric (its realllllllllllllllllly reallllllllllllllllllly soft!) & then on the top becca has like a light blue fabric with white clouds & blur castels & it said princess in silver...really cute & mine is like all different colors & it has snoopy on it...so cool! o yea & today we took part of one of those career choosing tests ya kno the ones that they have on tv shows alot..yea so that was fun & i think were taking the rest of it tomarrow!!!!!!!! it was fun lol

http://legallysuthern4.livejournal.com/5369.html

hey

today i made 35$ for babysitting my neighbors & im saving up for christmas & the 8th grade trip!!!!!!! but anyway for christmas every year my parents always gives us one big present & then a bunch of little ones like...when i was little i would get like a bike or something like that & last year i got my stareo& stuff and i figured out what i want as my big present this year...this is how my idea came to me...ok so i was thinking about how hearing some inside jokes from my friends in rochester & seeing pictures still isnt the same as actually being there to hang out with everyone so i decided that i want one of those vido cameras that makes dvd's so when i come to visit all my rochester peeps i can video tape it & then when i miss everyone or when i want to remember the good ol days then i can watch my dvd...it would b soooo much fun!
now im really excited & i cant wait till christmas break!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

love always
chel
http://legallysuthern4.livejournal.com/4982.html

hey

today my dad started yelling at me for no reason again. i hate it when he does that. i watched cinderella story with hillary duff (grrrrrr) ya kno? and now i feel like crap. i hate movies like that ...u kno where ppl live happily ever after in the end.  never really happens so why do they make movies about it? that bugs me. but last night me & becca had a movie night & that was fun but i still need to talk to someone right now.

love always
chel
http://legallysuthern4.livejournal.com/4787.html

hey

yesterday was so fun.  me and my friend rebecka & my cousin monica went to see red eye last night! it was the first night it was out plus it was a friday night so it was chaos at the movie theater! but heres the story:

ok so we were supposed to go to the 7:30 show and we ordered tickets online and everything but we couldnt make that one because monica had too much traffic coming home form work so we were going to go to the 8:55 so we called rebecka's mom to see if we could cancel the tickets online and get new ones but then rebeckas mom was mad because she said that we couldnt cancel the tickets we could just order new ones.  so monica called the movie theater & they said that we could go to coustomer service when we got there & chage the times so becka called her mom and i called my dad so it was good. we were late to the theater and the coustomer service line was kinda long so it took a while. when we got our tickets becka went to the bathroom and monica got snacks and i went to get seats.  well turns out they gave us tickets for the 9:50 show not the 8:55 show so i talked to a guy after walking into several different red eye theaters.  finally we found the right theater but we couldnt find 3 seats next to each other. luckily some nice ppl moved over so we watched the movie.  it was a good movie like a good story behind it ya kno but it wasnt scary i thought it would be really scary but it wasnt it just had like one scary part the rest of it is just suspenceful but it was good.

love always
chel

hey

ok this weekend was weird.   i liked it and it was a great weekend buton the other hand, it was terrible.  would u like the good part first or the bad part? ok how 'bout the bad part. ok well my moms friends, audry & carry & carrys daughter erin whos our age.  ok so on friday erin was cool but on saturday she was a pain in the but & i hated her. like i had to clean up after her & if we were playing a game & we had our own ways to play it we always had to play it her way & that night i had to sleep on the floor because she sprawled out on my bed and i was so mad. ok my good part was i got to go shopping & i bought a lot of cute stuff & im not gunna get  into that because im getting sick of typing so yea
c ya

love always
chel
